pokemonDescription: Gible is a small, blue, bipedal dragon-like Pok√©mon. It lacks a neck but has a large mouth, filled with sharp teeth. It has two horns on its head striped blue in the middle, and a large dorsal fin. Gible loves to bite anything, and that can be a pain for its Trainer if the Trainer gets bitten themselves. This habit of biting anything is probably instinctive, and it is very hard to train them to control their urges.
Abra uses psychic powers while it sleeps. Its dreams affect the powers that the Pokemon wields.
It has the ability to alter the composition of its body to suit its surrounding environment.
